examples: @Element1 and @Element2 enters the scene from two sides. Elephant starts to play with the ball
prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: Text prompt for video generation. Either prompt or multi_prompt must be provided, but not both.

aspect_ratio.title: Aspect Ratio
aspect_ratio.description: The aspect ratio of the generated video frame.

multi_prompt.title: Multi Prompt
multi_prompt.description: List of prompts for multi-shot video generation.

generate_audio.title: Generate Audio
generate_audio.description: Whether to generate native audio for the video.

shot_type.title: Shot Type
shot_type.description: The type of multi-shot video generation.

elements.title: Elements
elements.description: Elements (characters/objects) to include. Reference in prompt as @Element1, @Element2.

end_image_url.title: End Image Url
end_image_url.description: Image to use as the last frame of the video.
end_image_url.limit_description: Max file size: 10.0MB, Min width: 300px, Min height: 300px, Min aspect ratio: 0.40, Max aspect ratio: 2.50, Timeout: 20.0s

image_urls.title: Image Urls
image_urls.description: Reference images for style/appearance. Reference in prompt as @Image1, @Image2, etc. Maximum 4 total (elements + reference images) when using video.

items.limit_description: Max file size: 10.0MB, Min width: 300px, Min height: 300px, Min aspect ratio: 0.40, Max aspect ratio: 2.50, Timeout: 20.0s

start_image_url.description: Image to use as the first frame of the video.
start_image_url.title: Start Image Url
start_image_url.limit_description: Max file size: 10.0MB, Min width: 300px, Min height: 300px, Min aspect ratio: 0.40, Max aspect ratio: 2.50, Timeout: 20.0s

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: The duration of this shot in seconds

video_url.title: Video Url
video_url.description:
The video URL of the element. A request can only have one element with a video.

Max file size: 200.0MB, Min width: 720px, Min height: 720px, Max width: 2160px, Max height: 2160px, Min duration: 3.0s, Max duration: 10.05s, Min FPS: 24.0, Max FPS: 60.0, Timeout: 30.0s

reference_image_urls.title: Reference Image Urls
reference_image_urls.description: Additional reference images from different angles. 1-3 images supported. At least one image is required.

items.limit_description: Max file size: 10.0MB, Min width: 300px, Min height: 300px, Min aspect ratio: 0.40, Max aspect ratio: 2.50, Timeout: 20.0s

frontal_image_url.title: Frontal Image Url
frontal_image_url.description:
The frontal image of the element (main view).

Max file size: 10.0MB, Min width: 300px, Min height: 300px, Min aspect ratio: 0.40, Max aspect ratio: 2.50, Timeout: 20.0s

file_size.title: File Size
file_size.description: The size of the file in bytes.

file_name.title: File Name
file_name.description: The name of the file. It will be auto-generated if not provided.

content_type.title: Content Type
content_type.description: The mime type of the file.

url.title: Url
url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.
